verses.verse: "As for you, take <S%H5375><s%> up a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> for the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> was your mother <S%H517><s%>? A lioness <S%H3833><s%> among <S%H996><s%> lions! <S%H738><s%> She lay <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> young <S%H3715><s%> lions, <S%H3715><s%> She reared <S%H7235><s%> her cubs. <S%H1482><s%>

'When she brought <S%H5927><s%> up one <S%H259><s%> of her cubs, <S%H1482><s%> He became <S%H1961><s%> a lion, <S%H3715><s%> And he learned <S%H3925><s%> to tear <S%H2963><s%> [his] prey; <S%H2964><s%> He devoured <S%H398><s%> men. <S%H120><s%>

'Then nations <S%H1471><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> about <S%H413><s%> him; He was captured <S%H8610><s%> in their pit, <S%H7845><s%> And they brought <S%H935><s%> him with hooks <S%H2397><s%> To the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

'When she saw, <S%H7200><s%> as she waited, <S%H3176><s%> [That] her hope <S%H8615><s%> was lost, She took <S%H6><s%> another <S%H3947><s%> of her cubs <S%H259><s%> And made <S%H1482><s%> him a young <S%H7760><s%> lion. <S%H3715><s%>

'And he walked <S%H1980><s%> about among <S%H8432><s%> the lions; <S%H738><s%> He became <S%H1961><s%> a young <S%H3715><s%> lion, <S%H3715><s%> He learned <S%H3925><s%> to tear <S%H2963><s%> [his] prey; <S%H2964><s%> He devoured <S%H398><s%> men. <S%H120><s%>

'And he destroyed <S%H9570><s%> their fortified <S%H490><s%> towers <S%H759><s%> And laid <S%H2717><s%> waste <S%H2717><s%> their cities; <S%H5892><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> and its fulness <S%H4393><s%> were appalled <S%H3456><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his roaring. <S%H7581><s%>

'Then nations <S%H1471><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him On every <S%H5439><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> from [their] provinces, <S%H4082><s%> And they spread <S%H6566><s%> their net <S%H7568><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him; He was captured <S%H8610><s%> in their pit. <S%H7845><s%>

'And they put <S%H5414><s%> him in a cage <S%H5474><s%> with hooks <S%H2397><s%> And brought <S%H935><s%> him to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> They brought <S%H935><s%> him in hunting <S%H4685><s%> nets <S%H4685><s%> So <S%H4616><s%> that his voice <S%H6963><s%> should be heard <S%H8085><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> On the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

'Your mother <S%H517><s%> was like a vine <S%H1612><s%> in your vineyard, Planted <S%H8362><s%> by the waters; <S%H4325><s%> It was fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and full <S%H6058><s%> of branches <S%H6058><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of abundant <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

'And it had <S%H1961><s%> strong <S%H5797><s%> branches <S%H4294><s%> [fit] for scepters <S%H7626><s%> of rulers, <S%H4910><s%> And its height <S%H6967><s%> was raised <S%H1361><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> <S%H996><s%> the clouds <S%H5688><s%> So that it was seen <S%H7200><s%> in its height <S%H1363><s%> with the mass <S%H7230><s%> of its branches. <S%H1808><s%>

'But it was plucked <S%H5428><s%> up in fury; <S%H2534><s%> It was cast <S%H7993><s%> down <S%H7993><s%> to the ground; <S%H776><s%> And the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> dried <S%H3001><s%> up its fruit. <S%H6529><s%> Its strong <S%H5797><s%> branch <S%H4294><s%> was torn <S%H6561><s%> off <S%H6561><s%> So that it withered; <S%H3001><s%> The fire <S%H784><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> it.
'And now <S%H6258><s%> it is planted <S%H8362><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> In a dry <S%H6723><s%> and thirsty <S%H6772><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

'And fire <S%H784><s%> has gone <S%H3318><s%> out from [its] branch; <S%H4294><s%> It has consumed <S%H398><s%> its shoots <S%H909><s%> [and] fruit, <S%H6529><s%> So that there is not in it a strong <S%H5797><s%> branch, <S%H4294><s%> A scepter <S%H7626><s%> to rule. <S%H4910><s%>' "This <S%H1931><s%> is a lamentation, <S%H7015><s%> and has become <S%H1961><s%> a lamentation. <S%H7015><s%>
